name: SayOne Technologies
description: Fast growing IT company based in India.
overview:
Sayone Technologies provides custom software application development services to its clients from its offshore center in India. Clients who need design, development and implementation expertise in an outsourced offshore model can rely on our experience in executing turn-key as well as module based projects.

We believe our unique approach to offshore outsourcing combines significant cost benefits with lower risks and higher levels of customer service.We have been an exponent of the open source software and can help clients with leveraging the existing open source software with out diluting the security and support aspects. We have also enabled our clients to use the convenience of the rich client technologies like Ajax, Web 2.0 and Android

Clients who need design, development and implementation expertise in an outsourced offshore model can rely on our experience in executing turn-key as well as module based projects. The main things that come under consideration when going for outsourcing are Communication, Timely Delivery and Price and we promise you the same.

We have a very good exposure to the web developments over a decade and particularly in Django for more than a year. We have delivered a very good volume of projects with in this period.

Better communications give easier solutions! Please share your needs with us that will help us to give you the better feasible solutions for your choice

offices.address2: Pathuvana Building, Civil Station - Kunnumpuram Rd., Kakkanad
